ruleContent.content: var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup; var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document; var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element; var document = JsDom.parse(src); var htmlString = document.toString(); var dataMatch = htmlString.match(/data.*?'(.*?)';/); var keyMatch = htmlString.match(/key.*?'(.*?)'.*;/); var ivMatch = htmlString.match(/iv.*?'(.*)'.*;/); java.log(dataMatch); java.log(keyMatch[1]); java.log(ivMatch[1]); var decrypted; var datas; var datas1; if (dataMatch && dataMatch[1] && keyMatch && keyMatch[1] && ivMatch && ivMatch[1]) { var keyCrypto = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(keyMatch[1]); var ivCrypto = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(ivMatch[1]); decrypted = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(dataMatch[1], keyCrypto, {iv: ivCrypto, mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC}); datas = decrypted.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8); datas1 = JSON.parse(datas); result = datas1; } else { java.log(dataMatch); java.log(keyMatch[1]); java.log(ivMatch[1]); var no = "解密失败" result = no java.log(no) } ##\s{2,}##
